definition: being of delicate or slim build
details:
adjective
- being of delicate or slim build
= example: being of delicate or slim build
= synonyms: slight, slim, svelte
- moving and bending with ease
= synonyms: svelte, supple, lissome, lissom, lithe, lithesome, sylphlike
- small in quantity
= example: small in quantity
= synonyms: slim
- having little width in proportion to the length or height
= example: having little width in proportion to the length or height
- very narrow
= synonyms: thin
